Developer Terms of Use
des:
What is Boodskap IoT Platform?

Iot Company (or) any Developer can develop IoT Solutions using Boodskap Iot Platform. End User can start reporting their device to Boodskap IoT Platform. They can visualise the data by boodskap widgets. It's available in Boodskap Marketplace. 

You can define your rules in rules engine, for ex., if temperature level below 20deg celcius means raise event, event could be email, voice, sms, push notification etc., 

We introduce the Boodskap IoT Platform skill which helpful for end users, without logging into the system they just configure the actions by linking named rule. Once user create their action, anywhere in the world they can communicate with Alexa to perform the actions.

Skill Instructions as follows,

To Invoke Boodskap,
Alexa, "Start Boodskap I. O. T. Platform"

Link your amazon account to start using this skill, (email id should registered with boodskap iot platform)

To Invoke Boodskap Actions
Say "Boodskap 'what is my room temperature'"

To know about the Boodskap Actions list & count
Say "List Actions" (or) "List of Actions"

To get the Help
Say "Help"

To stop (or) signout from the the boodskap iot platform
Say "Stop"
